department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.title: Documents and Research Methods for the Study of Premodern Korea I: Seminar
course.description: Introduction of the different types of primary sources and research methodologies useful for study of Choson Korea. Students are required to write a research paper.
course.prerequisites: Korean History 111 or equivalent and reading proficiency in Korean. Reading ability in literary Chinese and Japanese helpful.
